glsa.title: Multiple format string vulnerabilities in neon 0.24.4 and earlier
glsa.synopsis: There are multiple format string vulnerabilities in libneon which may allow a malicious WebDAV server to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: neon provides an HTTP and WebDAV client library.

description.p: There are multiple format string vulnerabilities in libneon which may allow a malicious WebDAV server to execute arbitrary code under the context of the process using libneon.

impact.p: An attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code under the context of the process using libneon.

workaround.p: A workaround is not currently known for this issue. All users are advised to upgrade to the latest version of the affected package.

resolution.p: Neon users should upgrade to version 0.24.5 or later:
